ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The Audio Analyzer Demo showcases a real-time charts that use computer microphone in an MVVM code example. At a refresh rate of up to 100Hz the example receives audio data, converts it to frequency domain using a Radix-2 FFT and updates the screen with the result.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Audio Analyzer Demo showcases a real-time charts that use computer microphone in an MVVM code example.
At a refresh rate of up to 100Hz the example receives audio data, converts it to frequency domain using a Radix-2 FFT and updates the screen with the result.
